channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Black church leaders reject Charlie Kirk martyrdom and point to his race rhetoric
item.description: A debate has been sparked among Black pastors who are trying to square a heroic view of Charlie Kirk, the 31-year-old conservative activist who was gunned down in Utah this month, with the insulting statements about people of color that were key to his political activism.

item.title: Emotional Jimmy Kimmel says in late-night return he never intended to make light of Kirkâ€™s killing
